name: Calla Lily
desc: A flower that grows near water sources. When cooked, the petals have a chunky texture, yet are sweet and a little bitter.

customize.name: Calla Lily Seed
customize.desc: A seed obtained from the Seed Dispensary. A quality seed full of life, just waiting to be planted in the fields of the Realm Within. After some time, it will grow into a Calla Lily.

customize.name: Flora
customize.desc: Flora is the owner of the flower shop Floral Whisper. She is the younger sister of Chloris, a botanist who can be found in Windrise.

customize.name: Mora
customize.desc: Common currency. The one language everybody speaks.

customize.name: Diona
customize.desc: A young lady who has inherited trace amounts of non-human blood. She is the incredibly popular bartender of the Cat's Tail tavern.

customize.name: Kaeya
customize.desc: An accomplished swordsman and a strategic thinker in the Knights of Favonius, rumored to hail from beyond Mondstadt.

customize.name: Calla Lily Seafood Soup
customize.desc: A balanced combination of seafood. The delicacy of crab and mint make for a clear soup, and the calla lily brings it a refreshing taste.

customize.name: Crab
customize.desc: A shelled creature that lives near the ocean. Its flaky, delicious meat can easily be made into tasty dishes.

customize.name: Calla Lily
customize.desc: A flower that grows near water sources. When cooked, the petals have a chunky texture, yet are sweet and a little bitter.

customize.name: Mint
customize.desc: A refreshingly cool ingredient. The cool, fresh flavor can cut through the heat of many dishes.

customize.name: A Prize Catch
customize.desc: Tartaglia's specialty. It looks like a trapped beast floundering in an ocean of blood, its death throes an inaudible scream... But Tartaglia smiles and explains that this is something he fished out of the sea, with some products from his homeland on the side.

customize.name: Crab
customize.desc: A shelled creature that lives near the ocean. Its flaky, delicious meat can easily be made into tasty dishes.

customize.name: Calla Lily
customize.desc: A flower that grows near water sources. When cooked, the petals have a chunky texture, yet are sweet and a little bitter.

customize.name: Mint
customize.desc: A refreshingly cool ingredient. The cool, fresh flavor can cut through the heat of many dishes.

customize.name: Rainbow Aster
customize.desc: A unique drink. Having featured in the famous light novel "Pretty Please, Kitsune Guuji?", it has since been brought to life by Sailing Breeze in collaboration with Yae Publishing House, along with its fascinating flavor. As this version does not contain any bean products, it is slightly different from the special limited edition that was available during the Irodori Festival, but this also means that there's no risk of triggering any bean allergies.

customize.name: Milk
customize.desc: Sweet and fragrant cow's milk. Don't waste a single drop, not even that one rolling down your chin.

customize.name: Lavender Melon
customize.desc: A brightly-colored fruit. The flesh within transforms into food with a unique mouthfeel when cooked.

customize.name: Calla Lily
customize.desc: A flower that grows near water sources. When cooked, the petals have a chunky texture, yet are sweet and a little bitter.

customize.name: Mint

value.text:
Found near lakes
Recommendation: Found in Springvale
